ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning

Class ReplacementCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning.TextCleaner
      • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning.ReplacementCleaner

  • public class ReplacementCleaner
extends TextCleaner
    Text cleaner that applies a series of find/replace operations on a string.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplacementCleaner

        public ReplacementCleaner(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> replacements)
        Creates a new replacement cleaner with a map of replacements
        Parameters:
        replacements - The map of replacements. Keys in the map represent the patterns to find, and values represent what they should be replaced with.

        Creates a new replacement cleaner.

    • Method Detail

      • clean

        public AnnotatedString clean(AnnotatedString s)
                      throws TextCleanerException
        Description copied from class: TextCleaner
        Removes markup from a string.
        Specified by:
        clean in class TextCleaner
        Parameters:
        s - The original string. Note that this string can be modified by the method.
        Returns:
        The new string. Whether this object is a copy of s or s itself is left undefined.
        Throws:
        TextCleanerException - If a problem occurs when cleaning

      • cleanComments

        public AnnotatedString cleanComments(AnnotatedString s)
        Description copied from class: TextCleaner
        Removes portions of the string indentified as comments, but keeps all other markup.
        Specified by:
        cleanComments in class TextCleaner
        Parameters:
        s - The original string. Note that this string can be modified by the method.
        Returns:
        The new string. Whether this object is a copy of s or s itself is left undefined.

      • create

        public static ReplacementCleaner create(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Creates a new replacement cleaner from a list of find/replace patterns taken from a text source. The format for the text source is as follows:
        • Lines that begin with "#" or are made only of whitespace are ignored
        • Other lines must contain a find pattern, one or more tabs, and a replacement pattern
        Parameters:
        scanner - A scanner open on a text source
        Returns:
        A new replacement cleaner.

      • getInnerFiles

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInnerFiles()
        Description copied from class: TextCleaner
        Returns the list of inner files included in the file to be cleaned. Currently, this only has a meaning for cleaners based on LaTeX, which has include and input instructions. This result will be non-empty only after clean() has been called.
        Specified by:
        getInnerFiles in class TextCleaner
        Returns:
        The list of filenames
